title: Bank of America says BRICS’ won’t succeed in killing the dollar
description: As the curtain falls on 2023, the U.S. economy embarks on its journey towards recovery, bolstered by a slowdown in interest rate hikes. The Federal Reserve maintains a hopeful stance, anticipating rate cuts next year as the inflationary pressure on the U.S. dollar shows signs of easing. Amidst this economic upturn, the BRICS bloc – […]

title: The crypto bear market isn’t over yet – but its about to be
description: The crypto world has been navigating through a turbulent bear market, but as we edge closer to 2024, there’s a palpable sense of optimism in the air. This past year was a testament to resilience and innovation in the crypto space. After the tumultuous market crash of 2022 and the downfall of several blockchain giants, […]

title: U.S. economy gets major boost
description: The U.S. economy, in a display of resilience and strength, has been handed a significant boost. The preferred inflation measure by U.S. rate setters, the core personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index, has shown a more substantial than anticipated decline in November. This news has set the stage for positive investor expectations of potential rate […]
